title: 69: OBITCH caught in 4k...
description:
Oh sweet Geoffs, even a root canal and mysterious flu couldn’t keep us away from you this week. This week Spencer takes us through the terrifying history of teeth, and then Madison gives us the lowdown on spirit photography! We’ve got an obituary for a spooky king, one for a real innovative gal, and so much more! Oh we almost forgot, we’ve also got some dumb.ass.criminallllls! 


New episodes come out every Thursday for free, with 1-week early access for Wondery+ subscribers.


Follow along online: @obitchuarypod on Twitter & Instagram @obitchuarypodcast on TikTok


Write to us: obitpod@gmail.com


Spencer Henry & Madison Reyes

PO Box 18149 Long Beach, CA 90807


Get a cameo from us: https://www.cameo.com/obitchuarypodcast



Sources:


https://archive.org/details/strangecaseofwil0000kapl/page/22/mode/2up

https://www.officialdata.org/us/inflation/1860?amount=10

https://www.history.com/news/spirit-photography-civil-war-william-mumler

https://lincolncollection.tumblr.com/post/174406401789/the-story-of-the-lincoln-spirit-photograph

https://www.everythingzoomer.com/lifestyle/2021/10/29/spirit-photography-uncovering-the-story-of-hannah-green-the-19th-century-clairvoyant-physician-who-likely-invented-the-practice/

https://www.history.com/news/spirit-photography-civil-war-william-mumler

https://www.newyorker.com/culture/photo-booth/photographer-who-claimed-to-capture-abraham-lincoln-ghost

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Xsx6xqi0vzU&t=101s

https://www.cultofweird.com/blog/william-mumler-spirit-photography/

http://photographymuseum.org/mumler.html

https://books.google.com/books?id=8LUaAAAAYAAJ&dq=%22william%20h%20mumler%22&pg=PA304#v=onepage&q=mumler&f=false

https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-10443127/Pictured-Peadar-Doyle-carried-Irish-post-office-nephew-bid-claim-pension.html

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harry_Price#cite_note-33

https://www.nytimes.com/2022/09/14/style/rommy-revson-dead.html?searchResultPosition=30

https://exemplore.com/paranormal/Harry-Price-Famous-English-Ghost-Hunter

https://publicdomainreview.org/collection/the-spirit-photographs-of-william-hope

https://museumcrush.org/william-hope-the-fraudster-photographer-who-fooled-the-world-with-his-spirits/

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Hope_(paranormal_investigator)

https://allthatsinteresting.com/spirit-photography

https://au.news.yahoo.com/aussie-woman-special-message-mourners-funeral-000150873.html

https://au.news.yahoo.com/aussie-woman-special-message-mourners-funeral-000150873.html

https://www.cnbc.com/2022/09/20/beyond-meat-suspends-operating-chief-doug-ramsey-arrest-for-alleged-nose-biting.html

https://silveradofamilydental.com/true-history-false-teeth/

https://www.bbc.com/future/article/20160301-the-gruesome-and-mysterious-case-of-exploding-teeth

https://www.bbc.com/news/magazine-33085031

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Etruscan_civilization

https://ssfamilydentistry.com/blog/what-are-dentures-made-of/

https://www.buzzfeed.com/sam_cleal/facts-about-teeth

https://www.mentalfloss.com/article/73497/when-dentures-were-made-teeth-dead-waterloo-soldiers

https://www.historicmysteries.com/exploding-teeth/
